msbt.message: Here's what I wanted to give you earlier, to show my appreciation for what you did for me. Remember how you didn't have a free hand to take it home? Anyway, here it is along with my gratitude and love.

As promised, here's what I wasn't able to give you previously, when you couldn't carry my gift home. This small token of my appreciation can't match your generosity, but I hope I chose something you like.

Here's what I meant to give you earlier! I really do hope you like it. In retrospect, I'm actually glad your pockets were full before, so I could include this note to remind you how much I appreciate you!
